Package org.texgen.textures.color

Textures that are based on color and shading

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Background Works as a general colored background texture onto which a texture is merged.
Bars Generates a red/green set of squares 10 X 10 on the surface Used mostly for checking UV disturbance functions
ChannelSignalTexture Composes a texure from one or more individual signal inputs by setting the color values based on the input signal(s).
ColorFilter Filters the source image by a color.
HorizontalGradient Given a color gradient, this texture returns a color from the gradient based on the value of v.
ImageTexture Loads an image file and uses it to provide texture colors.
LightTexture A light-like texture that shades points based on how far they are from the position of the light in terms of u,v co-ordinates.
NegateTexture Returns the negative value of the input color.
RadialGradient Given a gradient this texture produces a circular gradient pattern centered at 0.5,0.5, with the gradient stretched to the corners of the texture.
SolidTexture Returns a fixed color based on the color passed in to the constructor
TextureGradient Calculates the texture color based on the input signal and a set of textures that is interpolates between as the signal goes from 0..1
UVColor Maps u,v values from 0..1 to red and green components in the final texture Used to test UV transformations
VerticalGradient Given a color gradient, this texture returns a color from the gradient based on the value of u.
 

Package org.texgen.textures.color Description

Textures that are based on color and shading
